#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int count(int l, int r) {
  if (l != r) return 1 + count(l, (l + r) / 2) + count((l + r) / 2 + 1, r);
  return 1;
}

int main() {
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    cout << 2LL * n - 1LL << endl;
    //cout << count(1, n) << endl;
  }
}
